query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN featuredImage IS NULL OR featuredImage = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as no_image, SUM(CASE WHEN featuredImage IS NOT NULL AND featuredImage != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_image FROM articles;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user gudLYJGHFgHSL8P.e6c1a8ce02e0 --database 3FN2mXfNpKxptvfrsuACXq --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN featuredImage IS NULL OR featuredImage = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as no_image, SUM(CASE WHEN featuredImage IS NOT NULL AND featuredImage != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_image FROM articles;
